[Kernel]


Classes

class  BALL::VIEW::CompositeManager
class  BALL::VIEW::ModelInformation

Detailed Description

Here we find the CompositeManager , which handles the creation, storing and deletion of Composite instances. The class MolecularInformation provides means to get names for molecular objects. Also there a serveral enumerations and methods, e.g. for model types of Representation 's.
